entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
